mutants.code:
def reverse_substring(s, n):
    if n > len(s):
        return s
    end_index = min(n + 2 * n, len(s))
    substring = s[n:end_index]
    reversed_substring = substring[::-1]
    return s[:n] + reversed_substring + s[end_index:]

def reverse_substring(s, n):
    if n < len(s):
        return s
    end_index = min(n + 2 * n, len(s))
    substring = s[n:end_index]
    reversed_substring = substring[::-1]
    return s[:n] + reversed_substring + s[end_index:]

def reverse_substring(s, n):
    if n == len(s):

    end_index = min(n + 2 * n, len(s))
    substring = s[n:end_index]

    return s[:n] + reversed_substring + s[end_index:]

def reverse_substring(s, n):
    if n >= len(s):
        return s
    end_index = min(n + 2 * n, len(s))
    substring = s[n:end_index]
    reversed_substring = substring[::-1]
    return s[:n] + reversed_substring - s[end_index:]

def reverse_substring(s, n):
    if n >= len(s):
        return s
    end_index = min(n + 2 * n, len(s))
    substring = s[n:end_index]
    reversed_substring = substring[::-1]
    return (s[:n] + reversed_substring) * s[end_index:]
